attributes.name: time
attributes.long_name: time in UTC (12:00am - 11:59pm)

attributes.name: solar_zenith_angle
attributes.long_name: Angle between Sun and the vertical

attributes.name: distance_from_sun
attributes.long_name: Earth-Sun distance

attributes.name: best_estimate_shortwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Best Estimate shortwave irradiance, sum of direct plus diffuse irradiance
attributes.comments: Sum of direct plus diffuse irradiance if both pass QC tests, else global shortwave if available

attributes.name: total_downwelling_shortwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Total downwelling shortwave irradiance
attributes.comments: Total (global) shortwave irradiance from unshaded pyranometer

attributes.name: diffuse_downwelling_shortwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Measured diffuse downwelling shortwave irradiance from shaded pyranometer

attributes.name: direct_downwelling_shortwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Measured direct downwelling shortwave irradiance from pyrheliometer

attributes.name: upwelling_shortwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Measured upwelling shortwave irradiance from pyranometer

attributes.name: downwelling_longwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Measured downwelling longwave irradiance from pyrgeometer

attributes.name: upwelling_longwave_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Measured upwelling longwave irradiance from pyrgeometer

attributes.name: atmospheric_temperature
attributes.long_name: Air Temperature
attributes.comments: Measured on cross-arms near top of tower

attributes.name: relative_humidity
attributes.long_name: Relative Humidity
attributes.comments: Measured on cross-arms near top of tower

attributes.name: surface_air_pressure
attributes.long_name: Surface air pressure

attributes.name: downwelling_longwave_case_temperature
attributes.long_name: Downwelling longwave pyrgeometer case temperature

attributes.name: downwelling_longwave_dome_temperature
attributes.long_name: Downwelling longwave pyrgeometer dome temperature

attributes.name: upwelling_longwave_case_temperature
attributes.long_name: Upwelling longwave pyrgeometer case temperature

attributes.name: upwelling_longwave_dome_temperature
attributes.long_name: Upwelling longwave pyrgeometer dome temperature

attributes.name: QC_flag_01_thresholds_global_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Is global shortwave missing, too high, or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: missing_data_or_test_not_possible no_known_issue global_shortwave_irradiance_too_high too_high_user_configurable too_low_extremely_rare too_high_extremely_rare too_low_physical_limits too_high_physical_limits fail_Rayleigh_limit_test tracker_off

attributes.name: QC_flag_02_thresholds_diffuse_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Is diffuse shortwave missing, too high, or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: missing_data_or_test_not_possible no_known_issue global_shortwave_irradiance_too_high too_high_user_configurable too_low_extremely_rare too_high_extremely_rare too_low_physical_limits too_high_physical_limits fail_Rayleigh_limit_test tracker_off

attributes.name: QC_flag_03_thresholds_direct_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Is direct shortwave missing, too high, or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: missing_data_or_test_not_possible no_known_issue global_shortwave_irradiance_too_high too_high_user_configurable too_low_extremely_rare too_high_extremely_rare too_low_physical_limits too_high_physical_limits fail_Rayleigh_limit_test tracker_off

attributes.name: QC_flag_04_thresholds_upwelling_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Is upwelling shortwave missing, too high, or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: missing_data_or_test_not_possible no_known_issue global_shortwave_irradiance_too_high too_high_user_configurable too_low_extremely_rare too_high_extremely_rare too_low_physical_limits too_high_physical_limits fail_Rayleigh_limit_test tracker_off

attributes.name: QC_flag_05_thresholds_downwelling_longwave
attributes.long_name: Is downwelling longwave missing, too high, or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: missing_data_or_test_not_possible no_known_issue global_shortwave_irradiance_too_high too_high_user_configurable too_low_extremely_rare too_high_extremely_rare too_low_physical_limits too_high_physical_limits fail_Rayleigh_limit_test tracker_off

attributes.name: QC_flag_06_thresholds_upwelling_longwave
attributes.long_name: Is upwelling longwave missing, too high, or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: missing_data_or_test_not_possible no_known_issue global_shortwave_irradiance_too_high too_high_user_configurable too_low_extremely_rare too_high_extremely_rare too_low_physical_limits too_high_physical_limits fail_Rayleigh_limit_test tracker_off

attributes.name: QC_flag_07_global_shortwave_over_sum
attributes.long_name: Is the ratio of the global shortwave (GSW) to direct plus diffuse (Sum) too high or too low?

attributes.name: QC_flag_08_diffuse_over_global_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Is the ratio of the diffuse (Dif) to global shortwave (GSW) too high or too low?

attributes.name: QC_flag_09_upwelling_shortwave_versus_sum
attributes.long_name: Is upwelling shortwave (SWup) too high (normal ground cover)?

attributes.name: QC_flag_10_downwelling_longwave_to_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is downwelling longwave (LWdn) too high? (snow cover)?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue LWdn_<_C11_*sigma*Ta4 LWdn_>_sigma*_Ta4+C12 LWdn_<_D11*sigma*Ta4 LWdn_>_sigma*_Ta4+_D12

attributes.name: QC_flag_11_upwelling_longwave_to_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is upwelling longwave (LWup) too high or too low?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue LWup_<_sigma*(Ta-C13)4 LWup_>_sigma*(Ta+C14)4 LWup_<_sigma*(Ta-D13)4 LWup_>_sigma*(Ta+D14)4

attributes.name: QC_flag_12_downwelling_longwave_to_upwelling_longwave
attributes.long_name: Are downwelling longwave (LWdn) and upwelling longwave (LWup) consistent relative to each other?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue LWdn_<_LWup-C15 LWdn_>_LWup+C16 LWdn_<_LWup-_D15 LWdn_>_LWup+_D16

attributes.name: QC_flag_13_downwelling_longwave_case_temperature_vs_air_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is the downwelling longwave case vs. air temperature within limits?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue Tc_<_Ta_-_C17 Tc_>_Ta_+_C17 Tc_<_Tavg_-_15 Tc_>_Tavg_+_15

attributes.name: QC_flag_14_downwelling_longwave_dome_temperature_vs_air_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is the downwelling longwave dome vs. air temperature within limits?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue Td_<_Ta_-_C17 Td_>_Ta_+_C17 Td_<_Tavg_-_15 Td_>_Tavg_+_15

attributes.name: QC_flag_15_upwelling_longwave_case_temperature_vs_air_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is the upwelling longwave case vs. air temperature within limits?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue Tc_<_Ta_-_C17 Tc_>_Ta_+_C17 Tc_<_Tavg_-_15 Tc_>_Tavg_+_15

attributes.name: QC_flag_16_upwelling_longwave_dome_temperature_vs_air_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is the upwelling longwave dome vs. air temperature within limits?
attributes.flag_meanings: test_not_possible no_known_issue Td_<_Ta_-_C17 Td_>_Ta_+_C17 Td_<_Tavg_-_15 Td_>_Tavg_+_15

attributes.name: QC_flag_17_downwelling_longwave_case_temperature_vs_dome_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is the downwelling longwave case vs. dome temperature within limits?

attributes.name: QC_flag_18_upwelling_longwave_case_temperature_vs_dome_temperature
attributes.long_name: Is the upwelling longwave case vs. dome temperature within limits?

attributes.name: QC_flag_19_air
attributes.long_name: Is the air temperature within limits?

attributes.name: global_shortwave_irloss_flag
attributes.long_name: Type of infrared (IR) loss correction applied to total (global)downwelling shortwave irradiance

attributes.name: diffuse_sortwave_irloss_flag
attributes.long_name: Type of infrared (IR) loss correction applied to diffuse downwelling shortwave irradiance

attributes.name: downwelling_shortwave_irradiance_assuming_clear_sky
attributes.long_name: Estimated clear-sky total downwelling shortwave
attributes.comments: Estimated from user-set power law coefficient settings in configuration file

attributes.name: ir_loss_correction_to_diffuse_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Infrared (IR) loss correction applied to diffuse downwelling shortwave irradiance measurements

attributes.name: ir_loss_correction_to_global_shortwave
attributes.long_name: Infrared (IR) loss correction applied to global downwelling shortwave measurements

attributes.name: downwelling_erythemal_uvb_irradiance
attributes.long_name: Erythemal UVB
attributes.comments: Instrument is weighted by the erythemal action spectrum

attributes.name: photosynthetically_active_radiation
attributes.long_name: Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR)
attributes.comments: Total (global) downwelling irradiance from 400 to 700 nanometers

attributes.name: wind_speed
attributes.long_name: Wind speed

attributes.name: wind_direction
attributes.long_name: Direction of wind

attributes.name: latitude
attributes.long_name: North latitude

attributes.name: longitude
attributes.long_name: West longitude

attributes.name: altitude
attributes.long_name: Altitude

global_variables.title: QCRad V3 Dataset from NOAA/ESRL/GMD/GRAD SURFRAD Data Archive
global_variables.institution: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) - David Skaggs Research Center - Boulder, CO
global_variables.comments: Raw data taken each minute and saved in daily files by test site
